section.title: Email Notification Templates
section.para: Many transactions generate email messages from Amazon Payments, sent to either the buyer, seller, or web site owner in the case of a marketplace transaction. Transaction details are listed in the body of the email message. The content of the email message sent out depends on the transaction and its status.
The table here defines the templates that are used, and provides a link to an example message for each.

entry.para: Email Template Name
Description
Bank account payment not authorized by the bank

section.title: Direct Debit Emails
section.para: The following sections show example emails.

section.title: DDI001

para.guilabel: Acknowledge Receipt of Direct Debit Instruction

section.programlisting:
Subject: Amazon Payments - Confirmation of the set-up of your Direct Debit Instruction
Amazon Payments Europe S.C.A. 5 Rue Plaetis, L-2338 Luxembourg
Greetings from Amazon Payments, Thank you for using Amazon Payments and setting up the Direct Debit Instruction on your Bank Account. By using Direct Debit, you will be able to add funds to your Amazon Payments account.
Having accepted your Direct Debit details, we would like you to confirm if they are correct. We request you to please check the details below: Account name: Thomas Jefferson Account number: xxxxx345 Bank Sort Code: xxxx234 If any of the above details are incorrect please contact us as soon as possible at https://payments.amazon.co.uk. If your details are correct, you dont need to do anything and your Direct Debit will be processed as normal.
Please provide 10 business days before initiating a transaction using Direct Debit on Amazon Payments. You have the right to cancel your Direct Debit at any time. A copy of the Direct Debit Guarantee is below.
For your information, the collections will be made using this reference. Service User Number: Reference:
Thank you for using Amazon Payments.
For further information, please visit our Help Pages: https://payments.amazon.co.uk

section.title: DDI-02

para.guilabel: Confirmation of setup of Direct Debit Instruction

section.programlisting:
Subject: Amazon Payments Confirmation of your Direct Debit request
Greetings from Amazon Payments,
Thank you for using Amazon Payments. This is a confirmation that your Direct Debit Instruction has been successfully accepted by your bank. You can now use Direct Debit to add funds to your Amazon Payments account.
The details of your Direct Debit instruction are below: Account name: Thomas Jefferson Account number: xxxxx345 Bank Sort Code: xxxx234 If any of the above details are incorrect please contact us as soon as possible at https://payments.amazon.co.uk. If your transaction details are correct, you dont need to do anything and your Direct Debit will be processed as normal.
Thank you for using Amazon Payments.
For further information, please visit our Help Pages: https://payments.amazon.co.uk

section.title: DDI-03

para.guilabel: Failure of Direct Debit Instruction Setup

section.programlisting:
Subject: Amazon Payments Important information regarding your Direct Debit request
Greetings from Amazon Payments,
Thank you for using Amazon Payments. This is to inform you that your recent Direct Debit Instruction request was not processed and we received a failure message from your Bank.
We request you to please check the details of your Direct Debit instruction below: Account name: Thomas Jefferson Account number: xxxxx345 Bank Sort Code: xxxx234 If any of the above details are incorrect please contact us as soon as possible at https://payments.amazon.co.uk. If your Direct Debit Instruction details are accurate we request you to kindly contact your bank to know more about the reason for failure.
You will not be able to use your Bank Account to add funds to your Amazon Payments account if the Direct Debit Instruction is not set up. We apologize for the inconvenience.
For further information, please visit our Help Pages: https://payments.amazon.co.uk

section.title: DDI-04
section.programlisting:
Subject: Amazon Payments Confirmation of your Direct Debit Transaction request
Amazon Payments Europe S.C.A. 5 Rue Plaetis, L-2338 Luxembourg
Greetings from Amazon Payments,
Thank you for using Amazon Payments. This is a confirmation of the Direct Debit transaction you initiated on the [insert date] to add funds to your Amazon Payments account. Having accepted your Direct Debit details, we would like you to confirm if they are correct.
We request you to please check the details below: Account name: Thomas Jefferson Account number: xxxxx345 Amount: Date of Transaction: If any of the above details are incorrect please contact us as soon as possible at https://payments.amazon.co.uk. If your transaction details are correct, you dont need to do anything, your Direct Debit will be processed as normal and you will receive the funds in your Amazon Payments account within 5-7 days of the transaction date.
Thank you for using Amazon Payments.
For further information, please visit our Help Pages: https://payments.amazon.co.uk

section.title: DDI-05
section.programlisting:
Subject: Amazon Payments Failure of Direct Debit transaction request Greetings from Amazon Payments, Thank you for using Amazon Payments. This is to inform you that your recent Direct Debit transaction request was not successful and we received a failure message from your bank.
We request you to contact your bank to know more about the reason this transaction failed. Below are the details of the transaction that was not successful: Account name: Thomas Jefferson Account number: xxxxx345 Amount: Date of Transaction:
Please note your bank account has not been debited for the above amount, and we request you to kindly contact your bank to know more about the reason for failure.
We apologize for the inconvenience.
For further information, please visit our Help Pages: https://payments.amazon.co.uk
